state.name: q1
state.decisionTree: if M2.1=d then if (M2.2=d OR M2.3=d) then p[1]=1/3, p[2]=2/3 else p[2]=1 end if else if ((NEG M2.1=e) AND (M2.1=a IMPLIES M2.1=b)) then p[1]=1/2, p[2]=1/2 else p[1]=1/4, p[2]=3/4 end if end if

state.name: q2
state.decisionTree: if M2.1=d then if (M2.2=d OR M2.3=d) then p[1]=1/3, p[2]=2/3 else p[2]=1 end if else if (M2.1=e AND M2.1=a AND (M2.1=b OR M2.1=c OR M2.2=c)) then p[1]=1/2, p[2]=1/2 else p[1]=1/4, p[2]=3/4 end if end if

state.name: q1
state.decisionTree: if M1.1=d then if (M1.2=d OR M1.2=d) then p[1]=1/3, p[2]=2/3 else p[2]=1 end if else if M1.1=e then p[1]=1/2, p[2]=1/2 else p[1]=1/4, p[2]=3/4 end if end if

state.name: q2
state.decisionTree: if M1.1=e then if (M1.2=f OR M1.2=e) then p[1]=1/3, p[2]=2/3 else p[2]=1 end if else if M1.1=a then p[1]=1/2, p[3]=1/2 else p[3]=1/4, p[2]=3/4 end if end if

state.name: q3
state.decisionTree: if M1.1=d then if (M1.2=d OR M1.2=e) then p[1]=1/3, p[3]=2/3 else p[1]=1 end if else if M1.1=e then p[3]=1/2, p[1]=1/2 else p[1]=1/4, p[3]=3/4 end if end if
